Key Match Events: Mendes scored a clinical finish in the 88th minute, securing a 1-0 win for Cape Verde against Mauritania
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde qualified for the AFCON quarter-final after beating Mauritania 1-0
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde maintained a decided advantage, hoarding nearly 70% of possession
Mauritania's most dangerous moment occurred in the 57th minute, with a free-kick sailing wide near the goal
Others: Cape Verde will now face the winner of the Senegal-Cote d'Ivoire fixture in the AFCON quarter-final
